channel.title: Help protect from cheat clients
channel.description: Someone logged into my server and turned himself into a object then spawned webs how do I protect my server from people being able to do that and protect from them ddosing it?

item.title: Help protect from cheat clients
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“darkageisme, post:3, topic:478106”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=596304.msg4198745#msg4198745 date=1357866420]

Someone logged into my server and turned himself into a object then spawned webs how do I protect my server from people being able to do that and protect from them ddosing it?

Add a UID to the client and make your server check for it, reject all of the other clients.
[/quote]
how would I add a uid never done before think can link me to a tutorial?[/quote]
You can search it. I’m sure there is one.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Help protect from cheat clients

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

darkageisme:

Someone logged into my server and turned himself into a object then spawned webs how do I protect my server from people being able to do that and protect from them ddosing it?

Add a UID to the client and make your server check for it, reject all of the other clients.
